actions.committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology

official_title: To require any department, agency, or instrumentality that contracts with the Federal Government to offer a health plan and pension plan.

summary.text: Employee Protection Act of 1996 - Prohibits any department, agency, or instrumentality from directly or indirectly receiving a Federal contract unless the department, agency, or instrumentality offers a group health plan and an employee pension benefit plan.

titles.title: To require any department, agency, or instrumentality that contracts with the Federal Government to offer a health plan and pension plan.
